c1.name: Vitiferous Elixir's Concoction
c1.descriptionRaw: When {LINK#N11130001}<color=#FFD780FF>Supporting Fire</color>{/LINK} hits an opponent, it will restore 6 Energy for Ifa. One such Energy restoration can be triggered once every 8s.
c1.description: When **Supporting Fire** hits an opponent, it will restore 6 Energy for Ifa. One such Energy restoration can be triggered once every 8s.

c2.name: Guiding Spirit of Ballistic Prayer
c2.descriptionRaw:
When Ifa is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, every Nightsoul point the party has above a total of 60 will grant Ifa 4 additional {LINK#N11130002}<color=#FFD780FF>Rescue Essentials</color>{/LINK} points.
Additionally, Ifa's Rescue Essentials limit is increased by 50.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent {LINK#P1132101}<color=#FFD780FF>Field Medic's Vision</color>{/LINK}.
c2.description:
When Ifa is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, every Nightsoul point the party has above a total of 60 will grant Ifa 4 additional **Rescue Essentials** points.
Additionally, Ifa's Rescue Essentials limit is increased by 50.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent **Field Medic's Vision**.

c3.name: Rebuttal in Negotiations With the Night
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11132}Airborne Disease Prevention{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of **Airborne Disease Prevention** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Decayed Vessel's Permutation
c4.descriptionRaw:
The restraining wind current created by the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11135}Compound Sedation Field{/LINK}</color> has its duration extended to 3s.
Additionally, Ifa gains 100 Elemental Mastery for 15s after using his Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Compound Sedation Field</color>.
c4.description:
The restraining wind current created by the Elemental Burst **Compound Sedation Field** has its duration extended to 3s.
Additionally, Ifa gains 100 Elemental Mastery for 15s after using his Elemental Burst Compound Sedation Field.

c5.name: Vow of Universal Coexistence
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11135}Compound Sedation Field{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of **Compound Sedation Field** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Oath on a Feathered Knot
c6.descriptionRaw:
When Ifa uses the Hold version of his {LINK#N11130001}<color=#FFD780FF>Supporting Fire</color>{/LINK}, there is a 50% chance that he will fire an additional Tonicshot that deals 120% of Ifa's ATK as Anemo DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.
Additionally, when he is not in combat, Ifa will consume 20% less Nightsoul points and Phlogiston in his Nightsoul's Blessing state.
c6.description:
When Ifa uses the Hold version of his **Supporting Fire**, there is a 50% chance that he will fire an additional Tonicshot that deals 120% of Ifa's ATK as Anemo DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.
Additionally, when he is not in combat, Ifa will consume 20% less Nightsoul points and Phlogiston in his Nightsoul's Blessing state.
